publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5269.2 Tommy Sheridan: Civic Participation - Trade Union Engagement with Scotland’s Civic Society—As an amendment to motion (S2M-5269) in the name of Ms Margaret Curran, insert at end "and, towards the aim of real and meaningful engagement with the trade union movement in Scotland, resolves to publicly encourage employees to consider trade union membership in all areas of employment and to implement trade union recognition audits of all companies and bodies which seek public contracts, grants or employment aid to ensure that only the best employers who recognise trade unions are entitled to benefit from public money in whatever form."
